title: Israeli intelligence chief's brother charged with smuggling cigarettes into Gaza
summary_full: Bezalel Zini, an Israeli military reservist on active duty, is accused of smuggling 14 cartons of cigarettes in exchange for $117,000.
summary_public: Bezalel Zini, an Israeli military reservist on active duty, is accused of smuggling 14 cartons of cigarettes in exchange for $117,000.

IL.label: neutral
